title: So, now that we're forced to use the trash client...
body:
Can you please fix it automatically resizing after each game to the smallest size?

Edit: Also, after leveling up, you cannot apply the mastery point or runes into the slot.

replies.body: I preferred the simplistic look of the old client, was easier to see information.

> [{quoted}](name=Main Line,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Z2zRVJR6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-11T00:45:35.969+0000)
>
> I preferred the simplistic look of the old client, was easier to see information.

Yeah, I prefer the older client. The one one is such a fucking headache to deal with.
Have no issues with the new-ish client outside of a few hiccups. Otherwise it runs very cleanly and smoothly without even using low specs mode or disabling the client while in game.

That's a problem native to you, and I haven't heard it from anyone else so sounds like it's pretty isolated. A client repair should fix it. Likely because you waited so long to upgrade something didn't go quite right. Personally, I've never had a single problem with the new client except for the lag issues at alpha launch (which they fixed pretty quick), and I upgraded straight away.
Can you add chat rooms to the new one?

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Z2zRVJR6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-11T01:36:05.040+0000)
>
> there both buggy garbage....

The old one was at least stable, though. It may have had issues, but it was faster, had far less issues, and the chat was synched.

This resizing issue is doing my head in. Old client never did that crap.

Honestly ive had an equal amount of bugs especially champ select ones from the legacy and the new client

Long story short, they are both shit imho.

Yeah I've had nothing but issues but tbh it's riot they never listen to oce fan base. My money is on that we will now be stuck with the new client regardless of how many people dislike it, and be stuck with a ton of bug issues sadly.
